Denuncia Vial

App to report illegally parked vehicles in Buenos Aires City.
Development
The brief was to to replace the existing hybrid app with a native one built from scratch. The UX team created the flow, then a designer came up with the UI and I did the development in Swift 3.

USIGNormalizador

iOS SDK for Buenos Aires City streets API.
Development Documentation
Developed with RxSwift to support multiple API providers (streets only, places, etc). Recently migrated to Swift 4.
